name: Good Cop Bad Cop (itch) (LukeDaaDuke)
description:
Good Cop Bad Cop is my submission to the Geojam 2022

It is a 2d platformer where you have to balance your bad and good sides to get through the levels and beat the game.

The jam's theme was: Pick A Side

I used this theme in the fact that you have to pick if you should be your good or bad side.
